title: Maxiter hard coded to 200,000; dlc 2.2b8

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Hello
I noticed that I can't change/update the max-iterations for multi-animal training beyond 200,000.
Is this intended as a feature or is it a bug?
Thanks so much,




                           [2, 4],
                             [6, 10],
                             [1, 6],
                             [1, 2]],
